website_summaries.verdict: Soft to the touch and supportive to the body, this pillow with a 15% incline is a great deal.
pros: Pillow is made of supportive memory foam
Removable cover is made of luxurious velour
cons: Some find it too soft for their needs

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to see if it would help with ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to see if it would help with an upcoming cruise. It works extremely well at eliminating snoring and easing back pain from extremely hard mattresses. Planning on buying a second one so my wife and I each have one on the cruise.
customer_reviews.author: BobCat Acres

customer_reviews.title: The cushion is perfect but I just wish that it wasn't so steep
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is perfect but I just wish that it wasn't so steep. I am unable to find one that is only at the most 5" high. Works great for acid reflux issues. My husband has one on the couch that he sits on to give him the extra hight he needs due to back problems. Has not strained his back since using it and that is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for recovery following rhinoplasty and was very pleased with it. My instructions were to keep my head elevated for 3 weeks at minimum following the surgery, and I was very worried, as I have never been a back sleeper. This pillow was a tremendous help to me. Everything about it made for a very comfortable sleeping experience during my recovery. The width and height were perfect. I kept a traditional pillow on either side for arm support, and to prevent rolling, and I slept well. I would very much recommend this pillow to anyone in the same situation, or someone looking to train themselves to sleep on their back for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Wife needed it to more comfortably sleep as she recovers from heart surgery
customer_reviews.text: Wife needed it to more comfortably sleep as she recovers from heart surgery. The day she got it, she moved off the recliner and into a more comfortable inclined sleeping position in bed! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: RCMORALES

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Don't be shocked when you first take it out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step mom. She has a lot of medical issues and this type of pillow was suggested to her. We love the height of this pillow it's perfect to use on its own or you can put your favorite pillow on top of this one and it dosnt raise you too high up. You do need to fluff it and give it a couple hours after you take it out for it to fluff up and omg the cover is so soft and washable!
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Better than imagined
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these pillows for separate beds and they have changed my sleeping experience for the better. Dealing with acid reflux at night has all but disappeared since sleeping on these pillows. They are of high quality. No one should be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pillowcase is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I would really like a new cover. This is ridiculous. instructions said to wash cover before use. so we do, then when trying to put it back on the pillow and zip it up the zipper completely breaks and tears everything. Pillow case is totally ruined and didn't even get to use it. send me a replacement please.
customer_reviews.author: H.K.

customer_reviews.title: Wedge is my BFF.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wedge! The memory foam is very comfortable. My shoulder/arm doesn't lose circulation during side sleeping. Foam doesn't get hot. Shape bounces back well in the morning. Would have married this wedge at any point during this past cold season, it was such a help. Husband and kids keep stealing... may need to order a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kwas

customer_reviews.title: good for vertigo
customer_reviews.text: I need to sleep with 2-3 pillows or else i get vertigo overnight. The pillows often move around and by morning i am not at an angle. This wedge is good to allow me to use 2 soft pillows on it, it keeps the pillows in place and it has made a big difference in my sleep quality. The only reason for 4 and not 5 stars is that it is not as high as it appears in the photo. Wish it was another 3-5 inches higher then i probably would only need 1 pillow with my silk pillowcase on it for perfect sleep. but i do love this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wedge.
customer_reviews.text: This wedge is not worth buying. It never puffed up and is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time heartburn issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help alleviate my horrible pregnancy heartburn. I like that this one is a slightly lower incline than some of the other options on the market. I still feel comfortable laying on my side while using this wedge and I don't feel like I am slipping down the include all night. The wedge did come very tightly rolled up and vacuum sealed and for the most part it has unrolled but a month later there are still marks on the fabric. It also had a chemical smell, after opening it, I left it out on the patio for a couple of days to off-gas. Overall a good buy, it has been helping significantly with my heartburn.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It has a subtle rise which made side-sleeping a bit more comfortable. The cover is soft and overall quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying a convertible Brookstone model that was too high, I ordered this. It has a subtle rise which made side-sleeping a bit more comfortable. The cover is soft and overall quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ellenk

customer_reviews.title: This seriously works wonders for my husband who has GERD ...
customer_reviews.text: This seriously works wonders for my husband who has GERD. He used to wake up in the middle of the night gasping for air, as he was choking on his own acid. We've had this pillow for about 6 months now, and not one episode.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I was very amazed and pleasantly pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very amazed and pleasantly pleased with this product. I suffered serious injuries from a vehicle accident and this Wedge Pillow provided much comfort and rest! I would definitely recommend this for anyone who suffers from pain and sleepless nights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cover is great addition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sleep on following shoulder surgery & it served its purpose admirably. I have also used it with the short end down to recline a bit in bed. It is the perfect mix of soft and firm for me, but that will vary from person to person. The cover is useful since it allows you to wash it when, say, your cats decide the pillow is infested with demons and cover it in cat saliva during their attacks. Also, did I mention the cover is durable? Neither claws nor teeth ripped it.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: But I love it. I literally can't sleep without it now
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected. But I love it. I literally can't sleep without it now. :)
customer_reviews.author: nickylou727

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. helps me sit up with pregnancy to stay comfy to sleep! also helps keep the heart burn away. sometimes ill flip it down under my feet if they are swollen or bothering me. Great purchase. I read reviews and saw some peoppe saying it was flat but i had no issues with mine. Plumped right up
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Comnfortable - Great for reading in bed!
customer_reviews.text: I just had spine surgery and needed a little more of an incline as I recuperate. This fit the bill and I have been able to move from sleeping on the couch, back into my own bed. Added bonus- I have always been an avid reader at bedtime. It used to always take forever to get the pillows just right so I could read comfortably for more than 10 minutes. This has eliminated that problem altogether. Very comfortable and I like having the removable cover that I can wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping wedge for reflux issues
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty hard to sleep on as far as comfort goes. It however seems to help with my reflux issues so overall that's the main factor to me. Aired our pretty fast. Cover is nice and soft. Just wish it was more comfortable. However you get what you pay for. This won't be a long term solution for me tho but for the price it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and wide
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help w/pregnancy. It's been a huge help. Comfy, supportive, and long enough that is gently elevates my entire torso, so no lower back pain/cramps. It is nice and wide, we have a queen size bed and there's plenty of room for me on it, but it does not interfere w/my husband's side of the bed. This is great for people w/heartburn, snoring, or those pregnant enough that it's a struggle to sit up form a laying position.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The best support pillow of your life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best support pillow ever. It takes about a full 48 hours to inflate, from being decompressed for shipping. Nothing but amazing things to say about it. I got it for my boyfriend, bc he needs a good support to not snore. This pillow & 3 regular pillows later, I haven't heard him snore since I got this for him! Miracle pillow for sure. Will buy myself one eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Forrest

customer_reviews.title: really helps me sleep better with acid reflux and my CPAP
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. really helps me sleep better with acid reflux and my CPAP. Only thing is before you use it you must wash the cover and let the pillow breathe. Cover feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fredda Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Wedge pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is excellent for sleeping. The angle, for me, is perfect. I don’t use it to read or anything other than sleeping. Keeps me elevated enough to help my congestion at bay.
customer_reviews.author: WPB reader

customer_reviews.title: Wedge pillow.
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my gerd. Haven't had to get up and take antacid since I got this. Not real high. I use my regular pillow with it. Just right for me. Quick shipping. No smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well to elevate my head gradually. Really best for sleeping on my back or sides, so sometimes I won't use it if I feel like sleeping on my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very good wedge pillow
customer_reviews.text: The item description was very accurate and back relief has been felt. Very good item at affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: JFRA

customer_reviews.title: but figured it was an easy thing to try
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant that this would stop my snoring, but figured it was an easy thing to try. I was a heavy snorer and would wake up every night in a panic attack not being able to breathe. I have been using this for two weeks now and have stopped snoring and waking up. Last night I thought I'll try not using it and I woke up in a panic not being able to breathe. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell was bad at first- after it's aired out it was very nice. Comfy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: This wedge pillow was delivered within two days in excellent condition. I love it
customer_reviews.text: This wedge pillow was delivered within two days in excellent condition. I love it! Its elevation has relieved congestion and heart burn. Most comfortable for reading in bed as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Trash... not worth $2
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the picture. It is a piece of trash. Foam was stained in urine color. I usually never post ratings because I agree with the ratings. This thing does not deserve a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic
customer_reviews.text: I have had a 35 ton bus hit me , and I'am in pain 24/7 this wedge helps tremendousy ,
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: At first this product was a bigger than I initially anticipated. However after using it for some time now, I can say that I use it daily. It's extremely helpful with your back when you want to sit up in bed to watch TV or read. It also helps a lot when you need to raise your head a bit more to help you sleep which is something that I need.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I can already tell that I love this thing, and it's only the first night. It's so comfortable! I have acid reflux and was worried that using one of these would adversely affect my sleep. Definitely not so! The slope on it is very subtle, and I actually find it to be more comfortable than not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Clean & Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very quick ship; Great height; A little too firm for me, but Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Good value and other than the way it fits me, it would be 5 stars. I just wish it was longer as I'm tall and 4-5" more in length would help it fit me better. I have to pull it away from the headboard which makes my pillow tend to fall into that empty space.
customer_reviews.author: RL - Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat and Unsupportive
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other reviews, this came rolled up. After unpacking, it never took shape or form of a wedge and stayed as a curve. I tried it out and it did not provide support at all.
customer_reviews.author: abraham jung

customer_reviews.title: Just the right height...
customer_reviews.text: I love this wedge pillow. I returned one I ordered from Costco cause it was too high. This one is just the right height. It helps me with my acid gas problem.
customer_reviews.author: RAUL ELNITIARTA

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Never unrolled completely. You get what you pay for. Spend $55-$75 for something nicer. Just got one today and it unrolled perfectly almost immediately. Was $70.
customer_reviews.author: ALEC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 y.o. son and he loves it! It was supposed for when he has a cold or such to help him breathe when he has a stuffed up nose. He is using it in a daily basis. He particularly likes the way the cover feels!
customer_reviews.author: Dinah James

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. Never fully opened up
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Never fully opened up. Ordered it despite many bad reviews because I was desperate after knee surgery. I would have returned it but now I couldn't do it right away because, you know, I just had knee surgery and now it's too late and I'm outside my return window. DON'T ORDER IT. Spend the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was uncomfortable. Kept sliding down and my neck was kinked.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as promised, though it was bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as promised, though it was bigger than I expected. They gave the measurements accurately, I just think about where to keep it in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nick in Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping better and experiencing less sinus issues. My girlfriend has noticed a change in my snoring as well, however that was never my concern, hell I can’t gear it!
customer_reviews.author: Mason C Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, best value for money on internet. High quality material inside out
customer_reviews.author: RakanG

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother - Its no longer a wedge when you get it
customer_reviews.text: Foam is compressed so badly in packaging that it never recovers. Don't bother - it will never be a wedge
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Oh my aching back NO MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: First morning in too many months that I got out of bed without shuffling around like Igor. My back isn't perfect yet but OMG what bliss not to be in debilitating pain. I truly believe the wedge is the answer to my lower back issues. Thank you Linenspa!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband - he really likes it. Cover is soft & washable.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Beecher

customer_reviews.title: I've washed it a couple times and it still feels bad.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it technically is a pillow wedge. It doesn't give enough support. When you want it to be hard its soft and when you want it to be soft its lumpy. The cover also feels really really weird and uncomfortable. I've washed it a couple times and it still feels bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The angle is just right
customer_reviews.text: I like very much just the right angle to help me sleep better
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mariano

customer_reviews.title: More medically necessary than for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my night time acid reflux. Not very comfy though, I guess its not meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian chick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad we bought these. Doubles as a headboard for us. Love being able to read or watch tv with the extra back support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product isnt even close to what is shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Item is so small even a pillow is bigger than it. False advertising
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: ... had surgery on my foot and it was the best pillow for comfort and keeping it elevated for 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my foot and it was the best pillow for comfort and keeping it elevated for 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Took about 48 hrs to fully expand but once expanded it did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Roque M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. It helps with night time snoring and I am able to breath easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hans V. Summers

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This is nothing like the advertisement. Terrible foam. Not firm at all. Super thin. Terrible quality. Find something better. I would give ZERO Stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Use it in multiple positions
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with GERD at night. Also great for watching TV or reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Joule

customer_reviews.title: too low
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all high enough. Unfortunately I did not return it in time so I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping much better since using it. I have sinus issues and thus has helped me breathe at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Way to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who needs to have her head raised when she sleeps. What a treat for her. She cannot stop talking about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carin Owen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has aided in improving the quality of sleep.i sleep.longet and more peaceful since this addition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for elevating while sleeping and propping your foot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Netha

customer_reviews.title: Good height for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Great for helping to heal my neck. 7 in wedge is the right height for sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Danelle S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My neck and shoulders do not hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My neck and shoulders do not hurt when I wake up in the morning. I do not Todd and turn all night. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was such an investment into better nights' sleep for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Helps my breathing at night when I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very nice and well-made. It is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wedge was perfect for use in bed and/or in a recliner
customer_reviews.text: This wedge was perfect for use in bed and/or in a recliner. It is very soft and comfortable on your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Petrovic

customer_reviews.title: This wedge pillow was too short to be comfortable. It came in a long box rolled up
customer_reviews.text: This wedge pillow was too short to be comfortable. It came in a long box rolled up. Once you take it out and it enlarges you cannot fit it back into the box. I had to buy an $8 box to return it. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Whetstine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice cover instead of plain white. Is is hard to find covers for these so it is nice to have one come with it. This provides great support for sitting up in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiamegs

customer_reviews.title: Linenspa Wedge Pillow with Removable Velour.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product - just found it a little too high. Seem to slip down during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Grizly8745

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wedge is ok when laying on your back only. Hurts your shoulder if you turn on your side
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cover is soft, but if you are looking for a substantial sized wedge, this is not your pillow. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ddyar27

customer_reviews.title: Linenspa
customer_reviews.text: she couldn't sit up with it. too high up. person kept sliding down to a laying down position. Would have liked to return it but through away box.maybe better for taller person but not for short person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It works for my husband, but gave me a sore neck.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Byron

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and holds up well, but it's actually 7" high, not 6 as noted. One inch of income doesn't seem like much, but for me it's the difference between sleeping without snoring and not sleeping at all. I ended up taking the foam out of the cover and using the electric knife to shave that inch off the bottom of the foam, which made the cover baggy...But allowed me to sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Kligora

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for reflux
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great help for my silent reflux symptoms. Delivery was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it. Ask me in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Tic Doff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it because it is hard pillow and I am used to a softer pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this thing is like concrete. it hurts the back of my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is like concrete. it hurts the back of my legs to try and prop up on it to relieve back pain. I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: pongladi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Pillow came rolled up and vacuum sealed. I thought it would take a couple hours for the pillow to expand. It has been unwrapped for the day and has not budged.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: i like the pillow but the zipper broke the first time i warshed it can i order a cover
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This item was described as 7 inches thick. Well ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was described as 7 inches thick. Well, it may have been at one time. But this items comes rolled up and compressed and more than likely won't ever regain its original shape. Mine has a permanent crease and has only sprung back to 5 inches in thickness. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Nomoreremoteclutter

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered one of these months ago, loved it and just ordered another. This one was vacuumed packed for shipping by Amazon and as you can see in the photo it might have ruined it. It's been 4 days and it is still not expanded back to where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam did not completely go back to shape ...
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam did not completely go back to shape. I washed the cover before using it but my eyes itched badly after sleeping on it. I don't know if it is the cover or the foam that gave me the reaction...i dont know what i am going to do with it now....
customer_reviews.author: HOPED

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedge Pillow / Relieves Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wedge pillow ever! Comfortable, easy care, great price. My husband has severe back and leg issues due to diabetes and a bad fall late 2016. He wakes every single morning with back pain. I purchased this pillow thinking of putting it under his knees. After reading the insert, we tried it under his head pillow first, and are we glad we did. Do you know his back pain in the morning is now minimal. We are shocked! And he is thrilled. He is not one to say anything at all, but this time he certainly said something to me. Thank goodness for the Linenspa Wedge Pillow. It has been a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: SissyMissy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Reflux
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my son was discharged from the nicu on reflux precautions and this one was the exact dimensions as the one they recommended for 30 degree incline, I ordered it 2 days before discharge and received it the way we got home, had an awesome warranty and even though my little guy doesn't actually come into contact with it, it's s really fuzzy soft material :) I have one happy preemie!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to hopefully help with his snoring. I was looking to avoid buying a very expensive mouth guard (starts with a "Z"...). I'm very happy to report that it's doing the trick! This product is fantastic, we're both sleeping through the night since the day it was received. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Linenspa Wedge Pillow
customer_reviews.text: As the mate of a snorer have to say this products has helped me sleep better as my mate does not snore nearly as much as before. She had tried Zyppah and a more expensive mouth guard and neither worked to eliminate the snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very nice and comfortable! I have acid reflux almost every night and this pillow has helped prevent it quite a bit! My partner likes it too, so much that she steels it to sleep on in the morning after I leave for work. I'm ordering another one for her today. Great quality for the price! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: It's worked great! In the last few weeks that I've been ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from acid reflux to the point it has given me an ulcer in my esophagus. I bought this pillow to help (along with medication and a diet change) alleviate my symptoms. It's worked great! In the last few weeks that I've been using this wedge pillow, I've not have an episode of acid reflux. I use it along with my regular pillow for comfort. The removable cover zips off and on easily, and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Shari R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, soft cover
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Got this to help address husband's GERD and snoring issues and seems to help with both, although he does not always love sleeping on it. Seems too short of a rise, when you see it in person, to work as intended; but once you layer your own pillow on there it is does seem like a better choice than a 12" version. The cover is super soft though don't know how it will hold up yet to washing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wedge
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these. One purchased to help my husband to sleep with a neck brace on - it worked - and the other for me to help with reflux and to be on the same level as my husband. Having experimented with cheaper wedges, we found that that the Linenspa is the best for us. It is very comfortable, supportive and is easy to sleep sideways on. The velour is is soft to the touch. We use very soft head pillows on top of the wedge and sleep soundly. Well worth the dollars.
customer_reviews.author: JanBear

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great for solving issues of heartburn and post-nasal drip from ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great for solving issues of heartburn and post-nasal drip from allergies at night. It was very firm at first but has softened up with use over the past month. I am so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have GERD and bought this pillow to help relieve my stress at night. It's a great pillow. I put my normal pillow on top of this one and it's really comfortable. It's the perfect amount of incline and really helps me get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works as good
customer_reviews.text: I have GERD and hiatel hernia. My Gastroenterologist recommended this to me. Before, I had just raised my bed with blocks. This has helped me about the same. It does take a long time to get use to. I often find myself in the morning slid all the way down. I use my regular pillow to sleep at the top of it. It isn't slippery, so I must just move around alot at night. I haven't washed it yet so I can't review that. No harsh chemical smells. Overall, I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, soft and firm, it gives excellent support. The velour cover is easily removed and feels good next to one's skin. An excellent product in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lee

customer_reviews.title: So nice I got one for the wife!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended.. it is firm and can stand upright on its own. Be sure to wash the cover before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow. And I love that it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow. And I love that it came with a removable case. We have a 10" one too, but that one is too high for me. I use a pillow on top to great the best height and neck support. These pillows are also great to stand up and use when reading in bed or a chair!
customer_reviews.author: BookieBeans

customer_reviews.title: Great night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad neck and shoulder. I also have acid reflux. Best nights sleep in a long time. I had bought this for my husbands snoring and I now have to order another one. I am keeping the 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M Gellar

product_meta.title: Linenspa Bed Wedge Pillow- Hypoallergenic - Support and Elevate Upper Body - Multipurpose - Alleviate Acid Reflux, Snoring - Removable Velour Cover
feature_bullets: The perfect angle for more comfortable sleep: Wedge pillow measures 24" x 24" x 7" with a 15 degree incline, which is the perfect angle to increase comfort and enhance your sleep
Conforming comfort foam minimizes pressure points: Super soft comfort foam conforms to your head, neck, and shoulders to help align the spine and decrease back, neck, and shoulder pain
Relieve symptoms of acid reflux and congestion: Sleeping at an angle opens your airways to help reduce congestion, sinus pressure, snoring, acid reflux and other respiratory problems

Great for a variety of everyday uses: use this pillow for added support while sitting up in bed, reading, working on a laptop, gaming, and sleeping; Or use it to prop your legs up to help minimize pressure points and promote circulation
Super soft, removable velour cover: Pillow is topped with a cozy velour zippered cover that can be easily removed and machine washed to keep your pillow fresh and clean night after night
